column5: Just curious... Anybody know what the water temps are around the Earfalls area ???

Not Lac Seul but you can probably get a good idea by the water temps on Lake Of The Woods. There is a buoy South of Kenora near Whisky Island that records data hourly. Water Temperature (WTMP): 54.1 Â°Fhttp://www.ndbc.noaa.gov/station_page.php?station=45148
We fished the mouth, lunker point, and clay banks on Lac Seul. The surface temp ranged from 56-60 F. This was the 17th-24th.
